alert.note: Alert for Crawford; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 18 at 7:17PM CDT until July 19 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Missouri, including the following areas, in east central Missouri, Crawford MO and Washington MO. In southeast Missouri, Iron MO, Madison MO, Reynolds MO, Saint Francois MO and Sainte Genevieve MO. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms will develop this evening and repeatedly move over the same location through the night resulting in heavy rainfall and potential for flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve; Washington
